entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with rain beginning early this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
